Fantastic food, prices, and service!!! Mojitos and margaritas are only €3.50 and a huge and delicious chicken salad was €6.50. Every single taco that they had was delicious. Had to go again the next day! The only thing that upset me was their take-away smoothie. I ordered a piña colada that was €4 and it came in a tiny little plastic cup! Probably only like 4 or 5 oz
